m_szDocTitle: Global Renewable Energy Capacity To Increase By 700 GW Over Next 5 Years, IEA
m_szDocSumamry: Global Renewable Energy Capacity To Increase By 700 GW Over Next 5 Years, IEA October 5th, 2015 by Joshua S Hill   With costs falling and emerging economies stepping into the game, the International Energy Agency is predicting renewable energy capacity additions to grow 700 GW over the next five years. The International Energy Agency (IEA) published its latest Renewable Energy Medium-Term Market Report 2015 report on Friday, in which it claims that renewable energy will represent the single largest source of electricity growth over the next five years, ending with a predicted 700 GW of global
